messageTexts.text: Hello Michael! Welcome back to our Auto Emporium. How may I assist you today?
Hi Dora, thank you for reaching out.
I'm on the lookout for a new electric vehicle. What models do you currently have in stock?
We've got several exciting electric vehicle options available. Are you looking for something in the sedan category or more of an SUV?
I'd prefer an SUV. Something that can handle a bit of off-road, has good range, and ample cargo space.
In that case, I'd recommend the 2024 Tesla Model X and the 2024 Ford Mustang Mach-E. Both are excellent choices for what you're looking for.
I've heard good things about the Mustang Mach-E. Could you give me more details on that?

Certainly! The 2024 Ford Mustang Mach-E offers an impressive range of up to 300 miles on a single charge. It features all-wheel drive, advanced driver-assist technologies, and a spacious interior with about 59.7 cubic feet of cargo space when the rear seats are folded down. The starting price is around $43,000.
That sounds like what I'm looking for. Can I schedule a test drive?
Absolutely, Michael! When would be a convenient time for you to visit us?
How does next Monday at 2:00 PM sound?
Monday at 2:00 PM is perfect. I'll have the Mustang Mach-E ready for your test drive. See you then, Michael!
